title: Rain Man
description: Selfish yuppie Charlie Babbitt's father dies and leaves a fortune to his institutionalized savant brother Raymond, whom Charlie didn't know existed.

title: Who Framed Roger Rabbit
description: A toon-hating detective is a cartoon rabbit's only hope to prove his innocence when he is accused of murder.

title: Die Hard
description: An NYPD officer tries to save his wife and several others taken hostage by German terrorists during a Christmas party at the Nakatomi Plaza in Los Angeles.

title: A Fish Called Wanda
description: In London, four very different people team up to commit a jewelry heist, then try to double-cross one another for the loot.

title: Big
description: After wishing to be made big, a teenage boy wakes up the next morning to find himself mysteriously in the body of an adult.

title: Dangerous Liaisons
description: A scheming widow and her manipulative ex-lover make a bet regarding the corruption of a recently married woman.

title: Mississippi Burning
description: Two F.B.I. Agents with wildly different styles arrive in Mississippi to investigate the disappearance of some civil rights activists.

title: The Naked Gun: From the Files of Police Squad!
description: Incompetent police detective Frank Drebin must foil an attempt to assassinate Queen Elizabeth II.

title: Beetlejuice
description: The spirits of a deceased couple are harassed by an unbearable family that has moved into their home, and hire a malicious spirit to drive them out.

title: Midnight Run
description: A bounty hunter pursues a former Mafia accountant who is also being chased by a rival bounty hunter, the F.B.I., and his old mob boss.

title: Cinema Paradiso
description: A filmmaker recalls his childhood when falling in love with the pictures at the cinema of his home village and forms a deep friendship with the cinema's projectionist.

title: Akira
description: A secret military project endangers Neo-Tokyo when it turns a biker gang member into a rampaging psychic psychopath who can only be saved by two teenagers and a group of psychics.

title: Grave of the Fireflies
description: A young boy and his little sister struggle to survive in Japan during World War II.

title: My Neighbor Totoro
description: When two girls move to the country to be near their ailing mother, they have adventures with the wondrous forest spirits who live nearby.

title: Heathers
description: In order to get out of the snobby clique that is destroying her good-girl reputation, an intelligent teen teams up with a dark sociopath in a plot to kill the cool kids.

title: Women on the Verge of a Nervous Breakdown
description: A television actress encounters a variety of eccentric characters after embarking on a journey to discover why her lover abruptly left her.

title: The Last Temptation of Christ
description: The life of Jesus Christ, his journey through life as he faces the struggles all humans do, and his final temptation on the cross.

title: Bull Durham
description: A fan who has an affair with one minor-league baseball player each season meets an up-and-coming pitcher and the experienced catcher assigned to him.

title: Working Girl
description: When a secretary's idea is stolen by her boss, she seizes an opportunity to steal it back by pretending she has her boss's job.

title: The Accused
description: After a young woman suffers a brutal gang rape in a bar, a prosecutor assists in bringing the perpetrators to justice, including the ones who cheered the attack on.

title: Gorillas in the Mist
description: The story of Dian Fossey, a scientist who came to Africa to study the vanishing mountain gorillas, and later fought to protect them.

title: They Live
description: A drifter discovers a pair of sunglasses that let him wake up to the fact that aliens have taken over the Earth.

title: Coming to America
description: An extremely pampered African Prince travels to Queens, New York, and goes undercover to find a wife that he can respect for her intelligence and will.

title: Willow
description: A reluctant dwarf must play the critical role of protecting a special baby from an evil queen to fulfill a prophecy.

title: Scrooged
description: A cynical television executive broadcasting a live production of 'A Christmas Carol' is visited by three ghosts on Christmas Eve.

title: Twins
description: A physically perfect but innocent man goes in search of his long-lost twin brother, who is a short small-time crook.

title: Child's Play
description: A single mother gives her son a much sought-after doll for his birthday, only to discover that it is possessed by the soul of a serial killer.

title: Young Guns
description: A group of young gunmen, led by Billy the Kid, become deputies to avenge the murder of the rancher who became their benefactor.

title: Dirty Rotten Scoundrels
description: Two con men try to settle their rivalry by betting on who can swindle a young American heiress out of fifty thousand dollars first.

title: The Land Before Time
description: An orphaned brontosaurus teams up with other young dinosaurs in order to reunite with their families in a valley.

title: The Unbearable Lightness of Being
description: In 1968 Prague, a Czech doctor with an active sex life meets a woman who wants monogamy, and then the Soviet invasion strikes.

title: Eight Men Out
description: A dramatization of the Black Sox scandal when the underpaid Chicago White Sox accepted bribes to deliberately lose the 1919 World Series.

title: Running on Empty
description: The eldest son of a fugitive family comes of age and wants to live his own life, but that would mean leaving his family forever.

title: Stand and Deliver
description: The story of Jaime Escalante, a high school teacher who successfully inspired his dropout prone students to learn calculus.

title: Bird
description: The troubled life and career of jazz musician Charlie 'Bird' Parker.

title: Hairspray
description: A 'pleasantly plump' teenager teaches 1962 Baltimore a thing or two about integration after landing a spot on a local TV dance show.

title: Tucker: The Man and His Dream
description: The story of Preston Tucker, the maverick car designer and his ill-fated challenge to the auto industry with his revolutionary car concept.

title: Dead Ringers
description: Twin gynecologists take full advantage of the fact that nobody can tell them apart, until their relationship begins to deteriorate over a woman.

title: Mystic Pizza
description: Three teenage girls come of age while working at a pizza parlor in the Connecticut town of Mystic.

title: Killer Klowns from Outer Space
description: Aliens who look like clowns come from outer space and terrorize a small town.

title: Bloodsport
description: Frank Dux, an American martial artist serving in the military, decides to leave the army to compete in a martial arts tournament in Hong Kong where fights to the death can occur.

title: Colors
description: An experienced cop and his rookie partner patrol the streets of East Los Angeles while trying to keep the gang violence under control.
